thread.title: John Terry reveals Frank Lampard shaves his tackle while admitting to his own intimate grooming habits
thread.title_full: John Terry reveals Frank Lampard shaves his tackle while admitting to his own intimate grooming habits

author: Natalie Evans
title: John Terry reveals Frank Lampard shaves his tackle while admitting to his own intimate grooming habits
text:
Sport John Terry reveals Frank Lampard shaves his tackle while admitting to his own intimate grooming habits The former Chelsea skipper told how he walked in on pal Lampard using a razor on himself in the dressing room before matches Share Frank Lampard is a team captain alongside Bradley Walsh on Play to the Whistle, hosted by Holly Willoughby (Photo: ITV) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
What happens in the men's locker room, stays in the men's locker room - unless you're a Chelsea player . 
John Terry has exposed Frank Lampard's intimate grooming secrets - revealing that his former teammate shaves his TACKLE. 
The former Chelsea skipper told how he walked in on pal Lampard using a razor on himself in the dressing room before matches. 
Terry spilled the beans on an episode of ITV’s comedy sports panel show Play To The Whistle, which airs next week. Read More The former Chelsea teammates revealed their intimate grooming secrets (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) 
Presenter Holly Willoughby was tickled as Terry revealed: “Frank is the biggest groomer I've ever met. 
“He shaves everything.” 
The footie ace then proceeded to demonstrate by lifting his leg and pretending to shave his privates, adding: “I've found him like this in the dressing room.” Read More Chelsea captain John Terry is learning Portuguese - and took his first lessons from Jose Mourinho 
Lampard, a team captain on the show, confessed: “I’ll admit, I’ve had a phase where I went completely shaven all over but I grew out of it. 
“But JT has found it later on in his life and he shaves all his legs and everything.” 
Cheeky Holly asked Terry: “Do you shave your b***s?” to which he admitted he does. Play To The Whistle airs next Tuesday on ITV at 9pm Like us on Facebook
